message: Hi Bob, I'm selling this product for $175. It's a great deal, and I'm confident you'll find it very useful. Let me know what you think!
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $120. Would you be willing to meet me halfway?

Bob, I appreciate your interest.  While $120 is a bit lower than what I had in mind, I'm willing to come down to $140. This still allows me to make a profit, and I'm sure you'll find it a good value. What do you say?
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but I'm still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to go down to $130?
